column4: I'm having issues with video playback and xinerama...video will only play in my primary monitor
both on the same card?
yeah
I bet if you look at your Xorg.0.log it says the second card isn't compatible
didn't see anything in the xorg log
if you run glxgears, and drag it between teh monitors do they both work?
yeah
if glxgears shows up on both monitors... then you should be fine...
but if you start it on that monitor does it do the same thing?
if I start it on the monitor it won't even play if I drag it to the primary monitor
for me if I start a movie on a monitor and drag it to one that's on another card it doesn't always work, but if I start i ton the other card it works fine
you sure both cards are fully supported by the driver you're using?
yeah, video won't work at all on secondary
only using 1 card
yeah, didn't happen in the distro I was using previously with similar xorg.conf :)
nvidia card?
yeah
thanks, I'll check it out
I'm also having some issue with where new windows are placed...but I think that's more kde specific
hope it helps... I had problems with my two nvidia cards and getting Xinerama to work(4 monitors), ended up doing two twinviews and then Xinerama and it works now
wouldn't know about that, I use GNOME
thanks...with twinview each monitor is a different desktop?
no, extended display... only thing I don't like about it is that maximize window spans both monitors
